issues.title: No approval process for strategy changes
issues.description: Document doesn't specify who can approve changes to the strategy
issues.suggested_fix: Add governance section: 'Strategy changes require approval from CIO and Risk Committee'

issues.title: No model validation procedure
issues.description: Uses 'quantitative models' but doesn't specify validation, testing, or approval process
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Models must pass backtesting requirements (Sharpe > 1.5, max drawdown < 20%) and receive Quant Review Committee approval before deployment'

issues.title: No rebalancing decision authority
issues.description: Doesn't specify who makes rebalancing decisions or approval requirements
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Rebalancing executed automatically by trading system. Manual overrides require PM approval and Risk team notification'

issues.title: No exception handling process
issues.description: No process for handling exceptional circumstances or model failures
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Exception Handling: PM may override model signals with Risk Officer approval. All overrides logged and reported to Investment Committee monthly'

issues.title: No review or audit procedures
issues.description: No specification of performance review, compliance audits, or documentation requirements
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Monthly performance review by Investment Committee. Quarterly compliance audit. Annual model revalidation'

issues.title: Volatility thresholds not specified
issues.description: States 'if volatility exceeds thresholds' but thresholds not defined
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'If portfolio volatility exceeds 15% annualized, reduce leverage by 50%'

issues.title: Stop loss levels not specified
issues.description: Mentions 'stop losses' but doesn't specify the loss threshold
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Individual position stop loss triggered at 5% loss from entry price'

issues.title: Market neutrality not precisely defined
issues.description: 'Market neutrality' could mean dollar neutral, beta neutral, or sector neutral
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Market neutrality maintained as dollar-neutral (long value = short value) and beta-neutral (portfolio beta target = 0 ± 0.1)'

issues.title: Monitoring frequency for beta not specified
issues.description: States 'monitored daily' but doesn't specify time of day or action trigger
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Beta calculated at 16:00 ET using 60-day rolling window. If |beta| > 0.15, rebalancing initiated within 1 trading day'
